system.powerDescription:
You reverse gravity’s effect on yourself and a {<CAT> people 0} sized group of other exorcists or humans with a low but constant Vector effect. For this scene, you gain the following benefits: 
        
• you can run, walk, or climb up vertical surfaces. 
• you can slow your fall at will, and you cannot take harm from falling 
• you can glide a distance equal to {<CAT> range 0} range. You must start at height to gain this benefit.
        
This power may easily effect the parameters of rolls, such as difficulty and risk.
